en: Visual media provides more than 80% percent of human sensory information. The ability of computationally understand the semantic content of visual media can be used for many intelligent computing and services. The Media Computing Group at Nankai University aims at solving important scientific problems in the areas of computer vision, machine learning, image and video processing, and fluid simul ation. Besides publishing research papers, many of our research results have been wildly used in popular everyday using commercial products.
cn: 视觉媒体提供了超过 80% 的人类感官信息。 计算理解视觉媒体语义内容的能力可用于许多智能计算和服务。 南开大学媒体计算组致力于解决计算机视觉、机器学习、图像和视频处理、流体模拟等领域的重要科学问题。 除了发表研究论文外，我们的许多研究成果已广泛用于流行的日常商业产品中。
欲了解更多信息，请访问
